body:
I"m trying to build spack on a power 8 cluster and I'm getting the error below due to the old config.guess and config.sub files that don't have information about the ppc64le platform.

The source for this package hasn't been touched for several years.
I guess the only way to fix this is to create a patch that replaces the config.guess and config.sub configuration files.

I can do the patch, if people agree and there is not another fix that I'm not seeing.
Thanks,
Jim G

cat -n /tmp/jeg/spack-stage/spack-stage-82EJxv/xextproto-7.3.0/spack-build.out
